articles.title: Dariq Whitehead has surgery on foot, expected to be back in fall for Duke Blue Devils men's basketball team
articles.description: Duke men's basketball's unfortunate history of significant foot injuries continued this week when top recruit Dariq Whitehead underwent surgery Tuesday to repair a fracture in his right foot.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chicago White Sox manager Tony La Russa misses game with unspecified medical issue
articles.description: The White Sox said manager Tony La Russa would miss Tuesday night's game on the recommendation of his doctors and would undergo further testing Wednesday.
articles.content:
CHICAGO -- White Sox manager Tony La Russa missed Tuesday night's game against the Kansas City Royals with an unspecified medical issue.

articles.title: Jackson State Tigers football coach Deion Sanders -- We are 'in crisis mode,' as water emergency worsens
